issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: If Eucalyptus DNS is not enabled, AWS compatibility regarding bucket URLs is broken with Walrus

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.summary: euca-install-load-balancer failes for having '_' in the bucket name

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: When creating bucket with underscore '_' fails after couple of retry. Steps to reproduce: a) create bucket with underscore, {noformat} conns3.create_bucket('hu_lk') {noformat} but the following works fine, {noformat} conns3.create_bucket('hulk') {noformat} *Boto error:* {noformat} In [31]: conns3osg.create_bucket('hu_lk') 2013-12-23 14:33:26,811 paws [DEBUG]:path=/hu_lk/ 2013-12-23 14:33:26,811 paws [DEBUG]:auth_path=/hu_lk/ 2013-12-23 14:33:26,811 paws [DEBUG]:Method: PUT 2013-12-23 14:33:26,811 paws [DEBUG]:Path: /services/objectstorage/hu_lk/ 2013-12-23 14:33:26,812 paws [DEBUG]:Data: 2013-12-23 14:33:26,812 paws [DEBUG]:Headers: {} 2013-12-23 14:33:26,812 paws [DEBUG]:Host: 10.111.5.59:8773 2013-12-23 14:33:26,812 paws [DEBUG]:Params: {} 2013-12-23 14:33:26,812 paws [DEBUG]:establishing HTTP connection: kwargs={'timeout': 70} 2013-12-23 14:33:26,812 paws [DEBUG]:Token: None 2013-12-23 14:33:26,812 paws [DEBUG]:StringToSign: PUT Mon, 23 Dec 2013 08:33:26 GMT /services/objectstorage/hu_lk/ 2013-12-23 14:33:26,812 paws [DEBUG]:Signature: AWS AKITX67F8IAZKUFV5ZFU:NxqRjW1hOTdDrtt3hm6rG46r/Ek= send: 'PUT /services/objectstorage/hu_lk/ HTTP/1.1\r\nHost: 10.111.5.59:8773\r\nAccept-Encoding: identity\r\nDate: Mon, 23 Dec 2013 08:33:26 GMT\r\nContent-Length: 0\r\nAuthorization: AWS AKITX67F8IAZKUFV5ZFU:NxqRjW1hOTdDrtt3hm6rG46r/Ek=\r\nUser-Agent: Boto/2.13.3 Python/2.7.5 Darwin/13.0.0\r\n\r\n' reply: 'HTTP/1.1 500 Internal Server Error\r\n' header: Content-Length: 298 header: Content-Type: application/xml header: Date: Mon, 23 Dec 2013 08:33:27 GMT header: x-amz-request-id: 76648484-7da2-4556-bf50-0c5228d8e1c0 2013-12-23 14:33:28,020 paws [DEBUG]:Received 500 response. Please try again.hu_lk3853d59f-1767-4e30-9626-4b3b849694ba {noformat}
fields.summary: OSG regression: bucket name with underscore '_' fails with 'Internal Server Error'

comments.body:
This property currently does not come with objectstorage,

{noformat}
PROPERTY	objectstorage.cleanuptaskintervalseconds	60
PROPERTY	objectstorage.failedputtimeouthours	24
PROPERTY	objectstorage.providerclient	s3
PROPERTY	objectstorage.queue_size	100
PROPERTY	objectstorage.storagemaxbucketsizeinmb	5120
PROPERTY	objectstorage.storagemaxbucketsperaccount	100
PROPERTY	objectstorage.storagemaxcachesizeinmb	30720
PROPERTY	objectstorage.storagemaxtotalcapacity	2147483647
PROPERTY	objectstorage.storagemaxtotalsnapshotsizeingb	50
PROPERTY	objectstorage.s3provider.s3accesskey	********
PROPERTY	objectstorage.s3provider.s3endpoint	10.10.10.10
PROPERTY	objectstorage.s3provider.s3secretkey	********
PROPERTY	objectstorage.s3provider.s3usebackenddns	false
PROPERTY	objectstorage.s3provider.s3usehttps	false
{noformat}
[~shaon], please check if this is still happening.
This issue is fixed with the new property {{objectstorage.bucket_naming_restrictions}} added in EUCA-8864.

Issue has returned in Eucalyptus 4.2 using BundleInstance.

Eucalyptus Version: {{4.2.0-0.0.23913.667.20150924git57c7fca.el6}}

Cloud property for OSG bucket naming restriction:
{code}
[root@a-18 ~]# euctl objectstorage.bucket_naming_restrictions --region euca-admin@localhost
objectstorage.bucket_naming_restrictions = extended

[root@a-18 ~]# euctl objectstorage.bucket_naming_restrictions -s --region euca-admin@localhost
objectstorage.bucket_naming_restrictions = The S3 bucket naming restrictions to enforce. Values are 'dns-compliant' or 'extended'. Default is 'extended'. dns_compliant is non-US region S3 names, extended is for US-Standard Region naming. See http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonS3/latest/dev/BucketRestrictions.html
{code}

Error seen from 'euca-bundle-instance':
{code}
[root@a-18 ~]# euca-bundle-instance -b ubuntu-trusty-x86_64-hvm-nginx -p ubuntu-trusty-nginx -o AKIAA427RQSJWZ5DGKYE -w RTdW6IPRXbc3TXzjsFmN8RkiWvB7auATP0lO9j9v i-f78f76eb --region devops-admin@region-1
euca-bundle-instance: error (InternalError): Unable to create bucket ubuntu-trusty-x86_64-hvm-nginx
{code}
Error seen in cloud-debug.log:
{code}
Tue Sep 29 07:23:11 2015 DEBUG [DnsResolvers:pool-151-thread-408] DnsResolver: AAAA compute.a-18.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com.
Tue Sep 29 07:23:11 2015 DEBUG [DnsResolvers:pool-151-thread-407] DnsResolver: A compute.a-18.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com.

Tue Sep 29 07:23:12 2015 DEBUG [Bundles:Compute.31] Unable to create bucket ubuntu-trusty-x86_64-hvm-nginx
